title: Diamond-studded Gold Vanki (Armlet) - Modern Elegance
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with brilliant-cut Diamonds. Features the signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine and rich color.
features: A contemporary take on the classic Vanki design. Features alternating teardrop and square settings, each meticulously encrusted with sparkling brilliant-cut diamonds. The open, flexible design ensures a comfortable fit.
colors: Warm golden hue with dazzling white diamond accents
creating a luxurious and eye-catching contrast.
occasions: or as a statement piece for special gatherings. Perfect for adding a touch of South Indian elegance to any contemporary outfit.
description: This Vanki is a beautiful blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The exceptional craftsmanship, the quality of the diamonds, and the warm glow of the 22K gold make this piece a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The flexible design ensures comfort, while the sparkling diamonds add a touch of glamour. It's a conversation starter and a symbol of refined taste.
